ma nisa aa witharagi (1968), aa hamuwuni mese mawuni (1969) yana kruthi dwaya samaga ko aananda namin kawyakaranayata bata he, 1971 aprel nangitima wisin sampadanaya kala wu karalikari deshapalana agniyen swakiya nirmana kaushalyaya muwahath karaganimin 'aluth iskole' (1974), nonawathi idiriyata' (1975), 'urumaya soya' (1976), 'nawa kalani palama' (1982) aadi kawya sangrahayan menma 'he siddhartha nam we' (1978) namin siya palamu nawa kathawa liya pala karamin deshapalana nirmana sampradayak bhikshun athara thahawuru kirimehi la purogami dayakathwayak dakwiya.

agnidiga aasiyawe prabalathama rakshana kramawedayan atharin mema rakshanaya ihalama sthanayaka la salakima pilibandawa shri lankeya apa aadambara wiya yuthuya.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma digu kalaka sitama madhyawedinge mithuraku lesa menma nirantharawa madhyawedin asuru karannaku lesada, ethumage manga penwima yatathe mema rakshana kramaya aarambha kirimata hakiwima wishala jayagrahanayaki.jathika rakshana bhara aramudala yatathe wruththiya madhyawedin sandaha nawa rakshana kramayak handunwa dima mahinda chinthanaye madhyawedi suba sadhanaye ek piyawarak sapala kirimaki.
ee kiyanne buddha kalayatath awu 300kata perayi.lowa paranima brahkmiya akshara hamuwanne ape ratin.

koment wala thibena eewa 100 % kma aththa.sampurna warada mahajanathawage.hangimbara wana wita buddhiya gawu gananakin pala yanawa.disthrikkayaka manapa layisthuwaka ihalinma inne ithama naraka pudgalayan.eewagema oonama rataka bala thulanayak awashyayi.bala thulanaya kiyanne eeniya widhayaka,wyawasthadayaka ,adhikarana noweyi.janamadhya,wipakshaya ha jathyanthara prajawa.methana jathyanthara prajawa kiyana sadhakaya itha wadagath.deshiya dushta balawega yam mattamakin kontrol wenne ee nisayi.oya kiyana sadhaka nathinam minissunta monawagen monawa weyida kiyala kiyanna ba.ee wagema kisima pudgalayek ho balawegayak gana purna wishawasaya thabana eka moda kamak.mama dakka api bodhi puja thiyapu rana wiruwan me widiyat karayi kiyala hithuwe na.me katha walata nam ithin hina wenawa ara karanna deyak na.hamudawa polisiya kiyana aayathana kageda eewa pihitawala thibenne ayi kiyana karana danne nathi asaranayange katha thamayi ee.
